MineException - Exception in edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper
An exception for illegal moves in MineSweeper, used in GUIGrid (its an unchecked exception, so it extends RuntimeException rather than Exception)

MineGUI - Class in edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper
